about_the_game:
This is the Official Soundtrack for Freakout: Calamity TV Show, including 18 tracks.

  • 01 - Tomavatars - The Freak Out Tv Show (Arena)
  • 02 - Tomavatars - Screen Man (Arena)
  • 03 - Tomavatars - Escape (The Streets)
  • 04 - Tomavatars - Killer Harvester (The Streets)
  • 05 - Tomavatars - The Roofs of Hope (The Streets)
  • 06 - Tomavatars - Train Toy (The Streets)
  • 07 - Tomavatars - Sealed (The Office)
  • 08 - Tomavatars - Copier Pack (The Office)
  • 09 - Tomavatars - Security Beam (The Office)
  • 10 - Tomavatars - Chopper Toy (The Office)
  • 11 - Tomavatars - Carousel (Lab)
  • 12 - Tomavatars - Life is a Wall (Lab)
  • 13 - Tomavatars - Ford for Mutants (Lab)
  • 14 - Tomavatars - Pac Men (Lab)
  • 15 - Tomavatars - A Maze (Mansion)
  • 16 - Tomavatars - Run! (Mansion)
  • 17 - Tomavatars - Lion Pinball (Mansion)
  • 18 - Tomavatars - Dance for Us (Mansion)


The Soundtrack will be available in your Freakout: TV Calamity Show folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\Freakout TV Calamity Show[/i]
